page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: Tomintoul School caters for both Primary and Secondary Pupils. Secondary Pupils undertake a 4 year course after which they transfer to Speyside High School, Aberlour. The original school was built towards the end of last century. In August l985, at the end of summer holidays we are moving into our new school. Work on the new building commenced in November l984. A section of the old school consisting of canteen, gym and two classrooms will be retained. The new school is situated behind the old school on the west side of Tomnabat Lane. The new school will have modern facilities and will provide a pleasant environment.
